item.title: 供应风险加剧，中国最大铜矿商将提高产量
item.description: 在铜价因预期赤字而向创纪录水平反弹之际，中国领先的铜矿商上调了产量指导。【原文：China’s leading copper miner raised its output guidance at a time when prices have been rallying toward a record on expected deficits.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称七月不需要减息
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔警告说，不要在 6 月和 7 月连续降息。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel warned against back-to-back interest-rate cuts in June and July.】

item.title: 尽管越南政局动荡，投资者仍对其趋之若鹜
item.description: 在过去几年里，越南的反贪腐运动已经让包括国家主席、副总理和政治局委员在内的一大批共产党高层领导落马。但这并没有阻止外国投资者的资金流入。【原文：Over the past few years, Vietnam’s anti-graft drive has taken down a slew of top Communist Party leaders, including presidents, deputy prime ministers and Politburo members. But that hasn’t stopped foreign investors from pouring in cash.】

item.title: 中国房价加速下跌，但仍在努力回暖
item.description: 4 月份，中国房价下跌速度加快，凸显了政府加大力度解决多年来房地产危机的原因。【原文：China’s home prices fell at a faster pace in April, underscoring why the government is stepping up efforts to tackle the years-long property crisis.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金将CPI后美元下跌作为买入机会
item.description: 据交易员称，亚洲的宏观基金利用美元周四下跌的机会买入美元，尤其是对日元。【原文：Macro funds in Asia used the dollar’s drop Thursday as an opportunity to buy it, in particular against the yen, according to traders.】

item.title: 中国房地产股因希望获得更多政策支持而反弹
item.description: 中国房地产开发商的股票延续涨势，因为投资者预计中国政府将在周五的会议后推出更多政策支持，以挽救陷入困境的市场。【原文：Shares of Chinese property developers extended a rally as investors expect Beijing to unveil more policy support after a Friday meeting to salvage the beleaguered market.】

item.title: 格拉斯-刘易斯建议赫斯投资者支持雪佛龙交易
item.description: 代理顾问 Glass Lewis & Co. 建议赫斯公司的投资者投票赞成雪佛龙公司 530 亿美元的收购要约。【原文：Proxy adviser Glass Lewis & Co. advised Hess Corp. investors to vote in favor of the oil company’s $53 billion buyout offer from Chevron Corp.】

item.title: 中国反弹后投资者青睐印度债券
item.description: 今年，印度债券的收益已经超过了中国债券，而且有理由认为这种超额收益还将继续。【原文：Gains from Indian bonds have surpassed those on Chinese debt this year and there are reasons to suggest the outperformance will continue.】

item.title: Jefferies 风险经理对 Archegos 的现金请求表示反对："有什么紧急情况？
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group）的一位风险经理想知道，为什么她在 Archegos 的联系人似乎急于从交易账户中提取数亿美元的超额现金。【原文：A Jefferies Financial Group risk manager wondered why her contact at Archegos seemed to be in such a rush to withdraw hundreds of millions of dollars in excess cash from its trading account.】

item.title: 中国房市崩盘可能导致数百万前途无量的职业生涯倒退
item.description:
本以为已经在中产阶级崛起的过程中赢得一席之地的专业人士，现在却在找工作，勉强度日。【原文：

Professionals who thought they’d won a secure place in the rising middle class are now looking for work and scraping by.

】

item.title: 白银成为炙手可热的大宗商品，需求和赤字推动白银反弹
item.description: 黄金创纪录的涨势可能是今年的头条新闻，但白银的涨势更猛、更快，因为这种不那么迷人的金属受益于强劲的金融和工业需求。【原文：Gold’s record-setting rally may have captured the headlines this year, but it’s silver that’s running harder and faster as the less glamorous metal benefits from robust financial and industrial demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好道指触及 40,000 点。杰米-戴蒙仍然担心通货膨胀。大卫-泰珀（David Tepper）在中国股票上大做文章。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The Dow touches 40,000. Jamie Dimon is still worried about inflation. David Tepper loads up on Chinese stocks. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 供应和通胀定调，石油将勉强实现周涨幅
item.description: 在供应和通胀前景成为关注焦点的情况下，石油期货保持窄幅震荡，有望勉强实现周涨幅。【原文：Oil was poised to eke out a narrow weekly gain as futures remained in a narrow range, with the outlook for supply and inflation in focus.】

item.title: 亚洲股市下跌，交易商重新考虑降息：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市早盘大多下跌，因为交易商重新评估了利率的未来走势，从而缓和了周三美国通胀数据带来的乐观情绪。【原文：Stocks in Asia are mostly headed for early declines after traders reassessed the path forward for interest rates, tempering the optimism linked to Wednesday’s US inflation reading.】

item.title: 苏里南石油资源总量预计达 24 亿桶
item.description: 据伍德麦肯兹公司（Wood Mackenzie）称，苏里南目前已发现的石油资源总计超过 24 亿桶原油和液体，天然气储量超过 12.5 万亿立方英尺。【原文：Suriname’s discovered oil resources now total more than 2.4 billion barrels of crude and liquids, and the nation has more than 12.5 trillion cubic feet of gas, according to Wood Mackenzie.】

item.title: 三位 Gridiron Capital 交易员将离开私募股权投资公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Gridiron Capital 高级常务董事 Will Hausberg 以及常务董事 Brad Skaf 和 Doug Rosenstein 即将离开这家私募股权公司。【原文：Gridiron Capital senior managing director Will Hausberg and managing directors Brad Skaf and Doug Rosenstein are leaving the private equity firm, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: KKR支持的OneStream秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，KKR & Co.支持的软件公司OneStream已向美国证券交易委员会秘密提交了首次公开募股申请，可能在几个月内上市。【原文：KKR & Co.-backed software company OneStream has confidentially filed with the US Securities and Exchange Commission for an initial public offering that could come within a few months, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 香港摇摇欲坠的加密货币 ETF 首次亮相削弱了全球枢纽的抱负
item.description: 香港首批直接投资于加密货币的交易所交易基金迄今未能像美国竞争对手的产品那样引发热议，这对香港推动建立卓越的数字资产中心是一个打击。【原文：The first Hong Kong exchange-traded funds investing directly in crypto have so far failed to spark the kind of excitement that greeted rival US products, a blow for the city’s push to foster a preeminent digital-asset hub.】

item.title: 碧桂园将与清算威胁展开法庭斗争
item.description: 碧桂园控股有限公司（Country Garden Holdings Co.【原文：Country Garden Holdings Co. is set to begin a major legal battle on Friday, squaring off in a Hong Kong court against a creditor seeking the liquidation of the defaulted Chinese developer.】

item.title: 应用材料公司业绩预测在股价上涨后不尽如人意
item.description: 美国最大的芯片制造设备制造商应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc., the largest US maker of chipmaking machinery, failed to impress investors with its latest forecast following a rally in the shares this year.】

item.title: 法瑞尔-威廉姆斯支持的冲浪公园项目获得弗吉尼亚海滩资助
item.description: 弗吉尼亚海滩利用市政债券市场，为一个由多次获得格莱美奖的艺术家法瑞尔-威廉姆斯（Pharrell Williams）支持的冲浪公园开发项目提供资金。【原文：Virginia Beach tapped the municipal bond market to help fund a surf-park development backed by multi-Grammy award winning artist Pharrell Williams.】

item.title: 铜、金价格飙升，多伦多股票销售反弹 98
item.description: 在经历了股票销售惨淡的一年后，加拿大最大的交易所因铜价和金价飙升，矿业公司筹集资金而出现反弹。【原文：After a miserable year for share sales, Canada’s largest exchange is seeing a rebound thanks to mining firms raising capital as copper and gold prices have spiked.】

item.title: 意大利 ERG 计划加大对美国可再生能源的投资力度
item.description: 意大利可再生能源集团 ERG SpA 正计划通过有选择性的合作伙伴关系扩大其在美国的足迹，旨在充分利用美国提供的慷慨激励措施。【原文：Italian renewables group ERG SpA is planning to expand its footprint in the US through selective partnerships, aiming to make the most of the generous incentives offered by the country.】

item.title: 金-卡戴珊（Kim Kardashian）的 Met Gala 礼服彰显了一个即将蓬勃发展的市场
item.description: 就在两年前，金-卡戴珊（Kim Kardashian）穿着玛丽莲-梦露（Marilyn Monroe）为约翰-肯尼迪（John F. Kennedy）演唱 "生日快乐，总统先生 "时穿的标志性裸色网纱连衣裙走过大都会晚宴（Met Gala）的红地毯，在网上引起了轩然大波。【原文：It was just two years ago that Kim Kardashian caused a stir online after walking down the Met Gala’s red carpet with the iconic nude mesh dress Marilyn Monroe wore when she sang “Happy Birthday, Mr. President” to John F. Kennedy.】

item.title: 千禧年、Point72 和 Citadel 是比特币 ETF 的买家之一
item.description: 说到比特币 ETF，投身其中的不仅仅是零售交易人群。现在很明显，对冲基金、养老基金和银行在比特币交易所交易基金经历了十多年的酝酿之后，也将资金投入到了比特币交易所交易基金中。【原文：When it comes to Bitcoin ETFs, it’s not just the retail trading crowd that’s taking the plunge. It’s now clear that hedge funds, pension funds and banks have also sprinkled capital into the exchange-traded funds after their blockbuster debut that was more than a decade in the making.】

item.title: Azul 首席执行官称 M&A 是拉丁美洲陷入困境的航空公司的救命稻草
item.description: Azul SA 首席执行官约翰-彼得-罗德格森表示，合并将降低拉丁美洲航空公司的资本成本，从而为客户提供更好的服务。【原文：Consolidation would lower the cost of capital for Latin American airlines, resulting in better services for customers, according to Azul SA Chief Executive Officer John Peter Rodgerson.】

item.title: 文艺复兴科技在反弹前大举买入 GameStop 和 AMC
item.description: 由已故吉姆-西蒙斯（Jim Simons）创立的量化基金文艺复兴科技有限责任公司（Renaissance Technologies LLC）在最近一次反弹之前，大举买入了记忆类股票的宠儿 AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc.【原文：Renaissance Technologies LLC, the quantitative fund founded by the late Jim Simons, loaded up on shares of meme-stock darlings AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. and GameStop Corp. ahead of the latest rally.】

item.title: 美联储巴尔就推迟提出银行奖金规定一事接受采访
item.description: 美国参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）向美联储负责监管的副主席询问，他是否会效仿其他监管机构的做法，强制银行从承担过多风险的高管那里收回部分薪酬。【原文：US Senator Elizabeth Warren pushed the Federal Reserve’s vice chair for supervision on whether he would follow other regulators’ lead on a plan to force banks to claw back some pay from executives taking on too much risk.】

item.title: 卢拉推动巴西国家石油公司新任首席执行官促进炼油厂和天然气投资
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）在将巴西国家石油公司（Petroleo Brasileiro SA）首席执行官赶下台后，将推动该公司的新掌门人加快对炼油厂的投资步伐，并扩大天然气供应。【原文：Brazil President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will push the new head of Petroleo Brasileiro SA to speed the pace of investments into refineries and expand its natural gas supplies after ousting the state-run oil company’s chief executive officer, people familiar with his plans said.】

item.title: 研究称，特鲁多推动住房建设的努力受到生产力薄弱的挑战
item.description: 据国家住房机构称，加拿大拥有每年多建造 70% 房屋所需的工人，而市政繁文缛节则是建造房屋的主要障碍。【原文：Canada has the workers it needs to build 70% more homes a year and municipal red tape is the main barrier to construction, according to the nation’s housing agency.】
